select id, createDate, updateDate, createUser, updateUser, username, name, password from sys_user su where 1 = 1
and (name like concat('%',#{name} ,'%') or username like concat('%',#{name} ,'%'))
and date (updateDate) = date (#{updateDate} )
and date (createDate) = date (#{createDate} )
and date (createDate) >= date (#{createDateStart} )
and date (createDate) <= date (#{createDateEnd} )
and date (updateDate)=date(#{updateDate} )
and date (updateDate) >= date (#{updateDateStart} )
and date (updateDate)<=date (#{updateDateEnd} )
and updateUser in (select id from sys_user s where (name like concat('%',#{updateUser} ,'%') or username like concat('%',#{updateUser} ,'%')))
and createUser in (select id from sys_user s where (name like concat('%',#{updateUser} ,'%') or username like concat('%',#{updateUser} ,'%')))
order by createDate desc
